Articles.Content:
I accepted 3 contracts.


I went from Kerbin > Sun > Eve > Gilly > Eve > Sun > Duna > Ike > Duna > Sun > Dres > Sun

Now I was on my way to Jool to complete the last parts, and somewhere on the trip the entire list reset itself and is saying I never flew by the previous planets/moons. Whats up with this?

-edit- Nevermind, while writing this the previous planets/moon ticked themselves. Odd.

Edited December 5, 2016 by Hexlord

ive had this happen on pretty much every contract that included multiple destinations, with them fixing themselves and showing completion upon completing another objective

Edited December 5, 2016 by DD_bwest
